channel.title: RecoveryScapeX classic 317 [webclient] - Endless gameplay, Open STAFF SLOTS!
channel.description:
I'm not selling any staff positions please understand. That's called being a bitch and I wouldn't do it.
[center][size=20pt]RecoveryScapeX [/size][/center]
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/recoveryx.zapto.org.png[/img][/center]
[center][B][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [/B] [url=http://www.recoveryscapex.co.nr/]RecoveryScapeX Webclient[/url]
[url=http://recoveryscapex.googlecode.com/files/RecoveryScapeX%20Desktop%20Client.zip]Portable Client Direct Download[/url][/center]
[B]Hello and welcome to my server thread. RecoveryScapeX is deltascape reloaded based. It has all the same features as delta reloaded. The one main difference is it has many more features including a fully functioning castlewars and many security breach fixes.[/B]
Here's some content. It's kinda outdated so why not login and play the server for yourself :P
[IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/120720/Capture039.png[/img] [IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/120728/Capture059164.png[/img] [IMG]http://[IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/111102/Capture335.png[/img] [IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/111102/Capture340.png[/img] [IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/111102/Capture337.png[/img] [IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/120720/Capture042.png[/img] [IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/120720/Capture044.png[/img]

I’m not selling any staff positions please understand. That’s called being a bitch and I wouldn’t do it.

[center][size=20pt]RecoveryScapeX
[/size][/center]

[center][/center]

[center] RecoveryScapeX Webclient

Portable Client Direct Download[/center]

Hello and welcome to my server thread. RecoveryScapeX is deltascape reloaded based. It has all the same features as delta reloaded. The one main difference is it has many more features including a fully functioning castlewars and many security breach fixes.

Here’s some content. It’s kinda outdated so why not login and play the server for yourself
